metadata.name: Write Protect For Storage Disabled
metadata.comment: Detects applications trying to modify the registry in order to disable any write-protect property for storage devices. This could be a precursor to a ransomware attack and has been an observed technique used by cypherpunk group.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\system\\currentcontrolset\\control')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('write protection')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('0')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storage')))

output.summary: Detects applications trying to modify the registry in order to disable any write-protect property for storage devices. This could be a precursor to a ransomware attack and has been an observed technique used by cypherpunk group.
